content.description: Stand start with a left hand on the crimp in the streak and hop to the ledge towards the right.  There are no feet to start - campus to a sharp crimp and work your way up and left to hit another good edge. After passing the crux, carefully navigate the top of the climb as it's not quite over!Not sure if this has already been done...
content.location: The most obvious line on the block, starting with a stand/jump start on the good edge in the streak.

content.description: This boulder is proud and easy to recognize, just 50 feet off the trail built into the hillside. The boulder is tall (~14 feet) and has a small, bare cave at the bottom with its namesake characteristic facing directly towards the trail.Definitely has potential for more problems, though it is pretty tall with a slanted landing.Not sure if this has already been logged elsewhere - let me know if it is!
